about_the_game:
A one-two punch that packs two new interactive cages, each with their own stories, twists and puzzles to solve. And to season this fine dish, we are adding seasonal content that will celebrate Christmas, Chinese New Year, and Halloween, through special decorative elements, seasonal music and very exclusive job offers!

The seasonal content will be activated during its respective seasons. The DLC can be downloaded at any time, but the seasonal-based content will be accessible on specific dates:

Christmas content ☃️ will fill your heart with holiday spirit from December 1st to December 31st.

Chinese New Year content 🐲 will be available from January 25th to February 24th.

Halloween content 🎃 will be scaring your monkeys from October 10th to November 4th.

The two new cages will be featured on DAY 1 of a new game. Those who played the game before should obtain the two new cages simply by starting a new game: starting one or two new games will usually suffice, and you'll notice if you got the two new cages immediately.

For new players, it is recommended to play the game "as is" initially, without forcing the new cages, since the tutorials are designed for the specific sequence of cages that players receive the first time they play the game.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: nudity or sexual content, general mature content

detailed_description:
A one-two punch that packs two new interactive cages, each with their own stories, twists and puzzles to solve. And to season this fine dish, we are adding seasonal content that will celebrate Christmas, Chinese New Year, and Halloween, through special decorative elements, seasonal music and very exclusive job offers!

The seasonal content will be activated during its respective seasons. The DLC can be downloaded at any time, but the seasonal-based content will be accessible on specific dates:

Christmas content ☃️ will fill your heart with holiday spirit from December 1st to December 31st.

Chinese New Year content 🐲 will be available from January 25th to February 24th.

Halloween content 🎃 will be scaring your monkeys from October 10th to November 4th.

The two new cages will be featured on DAY 1 of a new game. Those who played the game before should obtain the two new cages simply by starting a new game: starting one or two new games will usually suffice, and you'll notice if you got the two new cages immediately.

For new players, it is recommended to play the game "as is" initially, without forcing the new cages, since the tutorials are designed for the specific sequence of cages that players receive the first time they play the game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6490M 256 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400S, 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6750M (512 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Do Not Feed the Monkeys 2099 - Two cage seasoning pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 (32/64) or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 610 (1GB) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
  • Additional Notes: Using the Minimum Configuration, we strongly recommend to use minimal settings in order to not experience low frame rates.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 (32/64), Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 710 (2GB) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers

short_description: Arriving on December 13th, this 1st DLC will be absolutely FREE!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, German, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
